win_firewall_enable.command: netsh advfirewall set allprofiles state on

win_rule_ssh_in.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="SSH In" dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=22

win_rule_web_in.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="HTTP In" dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=80

win_rule_web_ssl_in.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="HTTPS In" dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=443

win_rule_backend_in.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Backend In" dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=8000

win_rule_database_in.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Database In" dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=5432

win_rule_redis_in.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Redis In" dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=6379

win_rule_prometheus_in.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Prometheus In" dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=9090

win_rule_grafana_in.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Grafana In" dir=in action=allow protocol=TCP localport=3000

win_rule_all_out.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="All Out" dir=out action=allow

win_block_telnet.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Block Telnet" dir=in action=block protocol=TCP localport=23

win_block_ftp.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Block FTP" dir=in action=block protocol=TCP localport=21

win_block_rdp.command: netsh advfirewall firewall add rule name="Block RDP" dir=in action=block protocol=TCP localport=3389
